name: Chilling Penalty
description:
When the attached character uses a Normal Attack: Deal +1 DMG. If this character has at least 6 HP, this Skill costs 1 less Cryo Die.
After this Skill finalizes, if this character has at least 6 HP, deal 1 Piercing DMG to them; if this character has no more than 5 HP, heal them for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2
